ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“Get off your spikey butt and
let's go, {Cloud}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
“Look, {Cloud}.
It's Rufus and Heidegger.”{PAUSE}“They're this close but we can't do
a thing to 'em…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
“Ummmm…
Gmmmmm…”{PAUSE}“How can he…
Goin' off laughin' like that?”{PAUSE}“Because of him,
Biggs,
Wedge,
Jessie…”{PAUSE}“Ggggggggh…
Ggggh…
Ggggggghhh!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
“God!!
I can't take it anymore!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna settle
things here and now!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Emergency alert! Reports of a
stowaway found!
Those not on detail, search
the ship. Report when found!”{PAUSE}“I repeat…
Stowaway sighted on board!
Those not on detail, search the ship.
Report when found!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Barret}
“Damn, did they find us!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“Hmm, I don't think it's us.
Did they find {Tifa}
and the others!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“Get off your spikey butt and
let's go, {Cloud}!”

dialogStrings:
{Barret}
“Look, {Cloud}.
It's Rufus and Heidegger.”{PAUSE}“They're this close but we can't do
a thing to 'em…”

{Barret}
“Ummmm…
Gmmmmm…”{PAUSE}“How can he…
Goin' off laughin' like that?”{PAUSE}“Because of him,
Biggs,
Wedge,
Jessie…”{PAUSE}“Ggggggggh…
Ggggh…
Ggggggghhh!!”

{Barret}
“God!!
I can't take it anymore!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna settle
things here and now!”

“Emergency alert! Reports of a
stowaway found!
Those not on detail, search
the ship. Report when found!”{PAUSE}“I repeat…
Stowaway sighted on board!
Those not on detail, search the ship.
Report when found!”

{Barret}
“Hmm, I don't think it's us.
Did they find {Tifa}
and the others!?”

{Barret}
“Get off your spikey butt and
let's go, {Cloud}!”
